title: Instagram reduces ‘Daily Limit’ notification time options
content:
Instagram has quietly updated its ‘Daily Limit’ feature that lets users receive notifications when they spend too much time on the app. However, instead of adding more control, the social network has reduced the time options for Daily Limit notifications.

more…

The post Instagram reduces ‘Daily Limit’ notification time options appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Instead of adding more control options, Instagram has reduced the time options that users have to set Daily Limit notifications.
